sentences.sContent: They rightly decry the unhealthily close ties of some European politicians to their counterparts in Russia.
sentences.sContent_eng: They rightly decry the unhealthily close ties of some European politicians to their counterparts in Russia.
sentences.sCn: 他们谴责了一些欧洲和俄罗斯政客之间过分亲密的关系。

sentences.sContent: Human rights monitors decry the imprisonment of a Qatari poet, Mohammed al-'Ajami, for spreading verse deemed seditious and insulting to the emir.
sentences.sContent_eng: Human rights monitors decry the imprisonment of a Qatari poet, Mohammed al-'Ajami, for spreading verse deemed seditious and insulting to the emir.
sentences.sCn: “人权监督”谴责卡特尔因为其诗人默罕默德·阿加米散布据信对现任埃米尔有煽动性和攻击性的诗句而监禁他。

remMethod.val: 受害者边哭 (cry) 边谴责 (decry)

trans.tranOther: to state publicly that you do not approve of something
